name: SalesAndMarketing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Sales And Marketing is a skill that will help you with quick, simple, and actionable sales and marketing strategies that you can use in your business each day. The strategies are designed to show you a technique you can use in your business right away to make your customers take action to buy products or become leads in your business.

From time to time we'll give you a more detailed strategy you can use in your business, but for the most part the strategies we teach you are short, sweet, and to the point. We know you'll appreciate getting highly consumable content for your business that you can use right away, or that will spark ideas for your sales and marketing.
